languages.text: "Это у вас еще отходняк не наступил. Но вы крепк{mf|ий|ая} — я видела, как бывалые матросы часами лыка не вязали после пары затяжек, а вы уже отвечаете внятно, и взгляд осмысленный".

"Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, clear-eyed and talking sense."
languages.original_text: "Это у вас еще отходняк не наступил. Но вы крепк{mf|ий|ая} — я видела, как бывалые матросы часами лыка не вязали после пары затяжек, а вы уже отвечаете внятно, и взгляд осмысленный".

traits.locale_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, talking sense, eyes clear."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, talking sense, eyes clear."

traits.locale_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, clear-eyed and talking sense."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Attendez un peu la descente. Enfin, il faut reconnaître que vous êtes coriace. J'ai vu des cosmomarins aguerris qui se sont retrouvés incapables d'aligner deux mots après une seule bouffée, mais vous avez l'air parfaitement lucide. »
languages.original_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, clear-eyed and talking sense."

traits.locale_text: « Attendez un peu la descente. Enfin, il faut reconnaître que vous êtes coriace. J'ai vu des cosmomarins aguerris qui se sont retrouvés incapables d'aligner deux mots après une seule bouffée, mais vous avez l'air parfaitement lucide. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Pues espere a ver el bajón. Aun así, es usted muy resistente; he visto a viajeros del vacío experimentados ser incapaces de hilar dos palabras con un par de caladas, pero aquí está, despejad{mf|o|a} y hablando con claridad».
languages.original_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, clear-eyed and talking sense."

traits.locale_text: «Pues espere a ver el bajón. Aun así, es usted muy resistente; he visto a viajeros del vacío experimentados ser incapaces de hilar dos palabras con un par de caladas, pero aquí está, despejad{mf|o|a} y hablando con claridad».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，后劲儿相当厉害。不过，你可真够厉害的。我见过那些老烟鬼船员，吸上两口就开始不省人事，胡说八道了，可你什么事都没有，眼神很清楚，脑子也很清楚。”
languages.original_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, clear-eyed and talking sense."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，后劲儿相当厉害。不过，你可真够厉害的。我见过那些老烟鬼船员，吸上两口就开始不省人事，胡说八道了，可你什么事都没有，眼神很清楚，脑子也很清楚。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「浸透するまで待っていな。でも、あなたはタフな方ですよ。ベテランのボイドマンが2、3回吸っただけで二の句が継げなくなるのを見たことがあるが、あなたを見てごらん。目がハッキリとしていて、言うこともまともだ」
languages.original_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, clear-eyed and talking sense."

traits.locale_text: 「浸透するまで待っていな。でも、あなたはタフな方ですよ。ベテランのボイドマンが2、3回吸っただけで二の句が継げなくなるのを見たことがあるが、あなたを見てごらん。目がハッキリとしていて、言うこともまともだ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wartet mal, bis ihr abstürzt. Aber Ihr seid ein zäher Nutririegel. Ich habe schon erlebt, wie erfahrene Raumfahrer nach ein paar kleinen Zügen keine zwei Worte mehr zusammengebracht haben, und Ihr habt noch einen klaren Blick und klingt völlig vernünftig."
languages.original_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, clear-eyed and talking sense."

traits.locale_text: "Wartet mal, bis ihr abstürzt. Aber Ihr seid ein zäher Nutririegel. Ich habe schon erlebt, wie erfahrene Raumfahrer nach ein paar kleinen Zügen keine zwei Worte mehr zusammengebracht haben, und Ihr habt noch einen klaren Blick und klingt völlig vernünftig."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Düşüş yaşayana kadar bekle. Yine de sağlam infazcı botusun. Bir iki nefes sonra iki lafı üst üste koymakta zorlanan, deneyimli uçsuz erleri görmüşümdür ama sen sapasağlamsın. Bakışların net ve mantıklı konuşuyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Wait 'til the crash gets you. Still, you're one tough nutribar — I've watched seasoned voidsmen struggle to say two words after just a couple of drags, but here you are, clear-eyed and talking sense."
